import React from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import axios from 'axios'; function SelectionFrom({route, value}) { const componentDidMount = () => { axios.get('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users') .then(res => { console.log(res); this.setState({ persons: res.data }); }); } const postDataHandler = () => { console.log('was clicked') } return (

{route} on {value.format("DD")} of {value.format("MMMM")}

 Name Number of Kayaks Start Time {/* */}
) } export default SelectionFrom;
